text:
"Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey" is a 1991 American science fiction comedy movie. It is the second movie in the "Bill & Ted" franchise, and a sequel to "Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure" (1989). Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter and George Carlin return to their roles from the first movie. It also stars William Sadler as Death. It received mixed reviews.
A sequel, "Bill & Ted Face the Music" is scheduled to be released in August 2020.
